entity.name: Material_Title
entity.query: select title as title_id from Material_Title where material='${Material.id}'

entity.name: LanguageString
entity.query: select textValue as title from LanguageString where id = '${Material_Title.title_id}'

entity.name: Material_Description
entity.query: select description as description_id from Material_Description where material='${Material.id}'

entity.name: LanguageString
entity.query: select textValue as description from LanguageString where id = '${Material_Description.description_id}'

entity.name: Material_Author
entity.query: select author as author_id from Material_Author where material='${Material.id}'

entity.name: Author
entity.query: select name, surname, concat(name, ' ', surname) as fullname from Author where id = '${Material_Author.author_id}'
